name: Werner Enterprises, Inc.
description: Werner Enterprises, Inc. is a leading transportation and logistics company headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska. Founded in 1956 by Clarence L. Werner, the company has grown to become one of the largest freight transportation providers in North America. Werner specializes in providing a range of services, including truckload transportation, logistics, and intermodal services, serving customers across various sectors, including retail, automotive, and manufacturing. The company operates a fleet of over 7,000 trucks and employs thousands of drivers, focusing on safety and efficiency in its operations. Werner is committed to investing in technology and sustainability, implementing advanced logistics systems and eco-friendly practices to reduce its carbon footprint. The company also emphasizes driver training and welfare, providing comprehensive support to its workforce. With a strong reputation for reliability and customer service, Werner continues to expand its capabilities and adapt to the evolving logistics landscape, positioning itself as a trusted partner for businesses seeking efficient transportation solutions.

seo.meta_title: Werner Enterprises, Inc. | Leading Transportation and Logistics Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Werner Enterprises, a top provider of transportation and logistics services in North America. Learn about our commitment to safety, efficiency, and sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Werner Enterprises provide?
faq.answer: Werner Enterprises provides truckload transportation, logistics, and intermodal services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Werner Enterprises?
faq.answer: Derek Leathers is the CEO of Werner Enterprises, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Werner Enterprises headquartered?
faq.answer: Werner Enterprises is headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, USA.
